next_steps.note: "Define the scope of network scanning: specify target network(s), desired scan types (e.g., port scan, vulnerability scan, OS detection), and acceptable scanning intensity.",
"Research and select a network scanning tool: Evaluate options like Nmap, Masscan, or OpenVAS, considering features, cost, and learning curve. Document the chosen tool and rationale.",
"Set up a test environment:  If possible, create a dedicated, isolated network or virtual machines to safely test the scanning tool and avoid unintended consequences on production systems.",

"Develop a basic scanning script/configuration: Create a simple script or configuration file for the chosen tool to perform a basic port scan on the test environment. Focus on successful execution and output parsing.",

"Document initial scan results and identify potential improvements: Run the initial scan, document the findings, and brainstorm how to refine the scan parameters (ports, timing, techniques) for more comprehensive and accurate results."
